sections.heading: Short title.  This Act may be cited as the Illinois Commonsense
Definitions.  As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Limited liability.  No person shall bring a qualified civil
sections.text:
liability action
in
State court against any seller of a
qualified product.

sections.heading: Exceptions.   A qualified civil liability action shall not
Dismissal of pending actions.  A qualified civil liability
sections.text:
action
that is
pending on the effective date of this Act shall be dismissed immediately by the
court in
which the action was brought or is currently pending.
